channel.title: Hard Drive installation problem
channel.description:
Hi everyone, I have a question for you. I got a 250 GB hard drive a few days ago from a friend and I went to put Windows XP on it and then it wouldn't boot to the XP CD. The BIOS detects the hard drive and when I put it in this computer as a slave it doesn't show up in My Computer or Disk Management, however it does show up in Device Manger. Now I'm not exactly sure what to do here, the hard drive is a Maxtor 7Y250P0. Anyone have any good suggestions for me?
Here are the pictures of the Device Manager and Disk Management:
[img]http://img131.imageshack.us/img131/339/devicemanagewp0.png[/img]
[img]http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/3672/diskmanagevo7.png[/img]

item.title: Hard Drive installation problem
item.dc:creator: @Zoilos Zoilos
item.description:
@Zoilos wrote:

Lol, then you’re lucky, I changed the boot priority to CD-ROM drive first and it still wont load from the CD unless there is different hard drive in, which is weird because the boot order has the CD first.

Read full topic

item.title: Hard Drive installation problem
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

In your bios make sure it is set so that it will first attempt to boot from a cd before going to the harddrive.

I bought a Maxtor too, and all I did was hook it up and when I booted up it was in ‘My Computer’, I just right clicked it and selected format.

Read full topic

item.title: Hard Drive installation problem
item.dc:creator: @Zoilos Zoilos
item.description:
@Zoilos wrote:

Format isn’t an option in Device Manager, Maybe I’ll DSL on a flash drive and see if I can get it working from there.

Read full topic

item.title: Hard Drive installation problem
item.dc:creator: @Zoilos Zoilos
item.description:
@Zoilos wrote:

On another topic

if you want it to show up in explorer or whatever, you need to format it

How can I format it without it showing up in Disk Management?

Read full topic

Well, here comes the useless spam, I don’t understand this, you piss and moan about these ‘useless moparscape n00bs’ and then you turn around and post uselessly.

If you can’t help would you please just refrain from posting, thank you.

item.title: Hard Drive installation problem
item.dc:creator: @Zoilos Zoilos
item.description:
@Zoilos wrote:

Umm, what the hell are you talking about? My Graphics Card has no place in ‘picking it up’ lol. I don’t know why you’d post if you can’t help me. And also even if the gfx card had something to do with it, I’ve tried three separate computers and two use on board graphics.

Read full topic
